name: BlockMount
description:
Global warming has finally occured in blockland!!! Acid water is rising and random blocks are falling from the sky!

How long will you survive for?

Controls:
Move - Mouse and WASD.

Block guide:
Grey blocks = Platforms.
Green blocks = Gives 30 - 50 health and 20 points.
Red = DEATH!!!

Highscores by dreamlo.com
Music my TeknoAxe

Recommended resolution : 1280 x 760

Submit your scores through the game and use the High scores viewer to check the highscores

Assets now available!!!
